TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上繪製一個資料列之後，就會發生事件控制項。The event occurs after a row is painted on a control. 可讓您在繪製資料列中的資料格之後，手動調整資料列的外觀。 allows you to manually adjust the appearance of the row after the cells in the row are painted. 這非常有用，如果您想要自訂的資料列。This is useful if you want to customize the row. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理進行跨整個資料列儲存格內容的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event to make the content of a cell span the entire row. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#30)]

summary.span: 取得或設定需要重新繪製的 區域。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示的區域，需要重新繪製。The property represents the area of the that needs to be repainted. 例如，如果使用者涵蓋整個另一個視窗，然後能夠抓出它，然後代表整個。For example, if a user covers the entire with another window and then uncovers it, then represents the entire . 如果使用者涵蓋的範圍縮小，然後發現，表示所涵蓋的範圍縮小。If a user covers a small area of the and then uncovers it, then represents the small area that was covered. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，當您繪製和它的儲存格的內容自己。Use the method when you draw the and its cells' contents yourself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法周圍的資料列可見的儲存格繪製焦點。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to draw a focus around the visible cells of the row. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含與目前的資料列相同的值屬性。The property contains the same values as the current row's property. 直接存取在可能會影響效能。Directly accessing a in the can affect performance. 使用在事件，以避免取消共用該資料列，並維持最佳效能。Use in the event to avoid unsharing the row and maintain optimal performance. 屬性是唯讀的。The property is read-only. 雖然您可以設定的屬性透過擷取屬性，新的設定會有任何作用。Although you can set the properties of the retrieved through the property, the new settings will have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來判斷用來繪製內容的色彩。The following code example demonstrates how to use the to determine the color to use to draw the content. 變數`e`，屬於類型。The variable, `e`, is of type . 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要存取目前的資料列內可用的資料列索引。The row index can be used to access the current row within a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取目前的資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the current row. 程式碼會取得在選取的資料列和第三個資料行中，交集的儲存格的值，並接著將此值繪製整個資料列。The code gets the value of the cell at the intersection of the selected row and the third column, and then paints this value over the entire row. 變數`e`，屬於類型。The variable, `e`, is of type . 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#35)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#35)]

span.span: Gets the state of the current .

value.span: 值的位元組合，指定資料列的狀態。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values that specifies the state of the row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可用來判斷是否資料列已凍結，唯讀的或已選取，還有其他狀態。This property can be used to determine whether the row is frozen, read-only, or selected, among other states. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否已選取目前的資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the current row is selected. 變數`e`，屬於類型。The variable, `e`, is of type . 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
